Posts.Content: dasha wrote: Hello Ladies, well this is my story .  I'm 28. Before Christmas my left breast got really sore. Had same problem about 4 years ago, had an ultrasound, everything was fine doctor prescribed vit b12. So I thought this must be the same thing. Had ultrasound before Christmas after new year found out that i'm pregnant with our 3rd child. The next day the doctor tells me that there is a lump but in my right breast and that I need a biopsy. Had then test yesterday(couldn't get one earlier) and now  the constant "what if" is driving me crazy. Have to wait till Thursday for the results. Don't know how i'm going to survive this time (: Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pregnant and waiting for diagnosis dasha dasha

Posts.Content: Jan 30, 2010 08:33AM dasha wrote: Thanks Pure! This what I wanted to hear, that even if there is something I could still go through treatments and the like, that there are others out there going through similar situation. I will let you know on thursday.
Posts.Title: Pregnant and waiting for diagnosis dasha dasha
